If you want to add a more sophisticated twist, I like to pluck [ch]E[/ch]-[ch]A[/ch]-[ch]D[/ch]-[ch]B[/ch]-[ch]G[/ch]-[ch]D[/ch].

Enjoy!

content.text:
Simon & Garfunkel - The Sound of Silence

Standard tuning
         
                                           [ch]Dm[/ch]
Throughout the intro you pluck like so: e|---1---1---1---1-|
                                        B|-----3-------3---|
                                        G|-2-------2-------|
                                        D|-----------------|
                                        A|-----------------|
                                        E|-----------------|

The only plucking part of the song is the intro, the rest is strumming, you'll have
to listen to the song to find the rhythm. Good luck.


[Intro] 

(Start plucking on the 'G' string, and say "Hello" on the third time you pluck
the 'B' string. The rest of the chords are above the corresponding syllables, just keep
the plucking rhythm while you transition.)


[ch]Dm[/ch]                        [ch]C[/ch]
    Hello darkness my old friend
                           [ch]Dm[/ch]
I've come to talk with you again
          [ch]F[/ch]          [ch]Bb[/ch]      [ch]F[/ch]
Because a vision softly creeping
                       [ch]Bb[/ch]       [ch]F[/ch]
Left his seeds while I was sleeping
        [ch]Bb[/ch]                            [ch]F[/ch]
And the vision that was planted in my brain
               [ch]Dm[/ch]   [ch]F[/ch]            [ch]C[/ch]        [ch]Dm[/ch]          
Still remain          within the sound of silence.


[Verse 1]

                             [ch]C[/ch]
In restless dreams I walked alone
                          [ch]Dm[/ch]
Narrow streets of cobbled stone
           [ch]F[/ch]       [ch]Bb[/ch]       [ch]F[/ch]
'Neath the halo of a street lamp
                          [ch]Bb[/ch]       [ch]F[/ch]
I turned my collar to the cold and damp
        [ch]Bb[/ch]                                       [ch]F[/ch]
When my eyes were stabbed by the flash of a neon light
                       [ch]Dm[/ch]   [ch]F[/ch]                 [ch]C[/ch]        [ch]Dm[/ch]
That split the night          and touched the sound of silence.


[Verse 2]

                         [ch]C[/ch]
And in the naked light I saw
                          [ch]Dm[/ch]
Ten thousand people maybe more
       [ch]F[/ch]           [ch]Bb[/ch]       [ch]F[/ch]
People talking without speaking
                   [ch]Bb[/ch]        [ch]F[/ch]
People hearing without listening
               [ch]Bb[/ch]                      [ch]F[/ch]
People writing songs that voices never share 
                  [ch]Dm[/ch]   [ch]F[/ch]             [ch]C[/ch]        [ch]Dm[/ch]
And no one dare          disturb the sound of silence


[Verse 3]

                        [ch]C[/ch]
Fools said I you do not know
                      [ch]Dm[/ch]
Silence like a cancer grow
        [ch]F[/ch]            [ch]Bb[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]
Hear my words that I might teach you
                   [ch]Bb[/ch]          [ch]F[/ch]
Take my arm that I might reach you
       [ch]Bb[/ch]                          [ch]F[/ch]
But my words like silent raindrops fell
[ch]Dm[/ch]       [ch]F[/ch]             [ch]C[/ch]       [ch]Dm[/ch]
     And echoed in the well of silence


[Verse 4]

                         [ch]C[/ch]
And the people bowed and prayed
                     [ch]Dm[/ch]
To the neon god they made
        [ch]F[/ch]                [ch]Bb[/ch]      [ch]F[/ch]
And the sign flashed out its warning
                     [ch]Bb[/ch]      [ch]F[/ch]
In the words that it was forming

And the sign said 
    [ch]Bb[/ch]                                              [ch]F[/ch]
The words of the prophets are written on the subway walls
                     [ch]Dm[/ch]       [ch]F[/ch]                [ch]C[/ch]        [ch]Dm[/ch]
And tenement halls        and whispered in the sound of silence


Enjoy,
Todd

Para tocar esta canción se debe colocar un capotraste en el traste nº3.
El patrón de arpegio de la canción es: BAJO + cuerdas 2, 3 y 4.
Se debe estar concentrado para hacer el arpegio suave y constante.
En una parte coloco un asterisco (*) para indicar que a partir de ese acorde
se debe tocar rasgueado y lo vuelvo a colocar
para indicar que se regresa al arpegio.
*Opcionalmente se puede tocar el último coro
rasgueandolo y arpegiar la ultima frase*

Los nombres de los acordes están hechos a base de la posición del capo en el
traste nº3, el cual es el tono original de la canción.
También se puede mover el capo hasta dar un tono
en el que podamos cantar con nuestra voz.
